Title: Authorizes and directs the public service commission to conduct a study on the deployment of energy interconnection processes into the electrical grid
Summary: Authorizes and directs the public service commission to conduct a study on the deployment of energy interconnection processes into the electrical grid to meet the state's renewable energy goals set out under the climate leadership and community protection act; directs the public service commission to submit a report on its findings one year after the effective date.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize and direct the public service commission to conduct a study on the deployment of energy interconnection processes into the electrical grid
